website_summaries.verdict: Self-adhesive nipple concealers that offer a great value.
pros: Made from medical-grade, hypo-allergenic silicone to accommodate sensitive skin
Lightweight and handy, they are small enough to fit in a handbag
Self-adhesive  and reusable if washed with warm water and mild soap after each use
Manufacturer claims each pair can be reused 25 times or more
Least expensive of all products of this type reviewed
cons: A few purchasers said they showed through clothes and didn't provide enough concealment

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I cant wear a bra right now and needed something to hide when I'm cold at work. I was skeptical but decided to try these. I have used the same pair 5 times now including all day at work and outside getting sweaty in the heat running errands. They have stayed on and done what I needed them to do and I'm a big lady. The one pair I'm using still adhere just as well as the first time I used them and I anticipate them lasting a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Crystaphaze

customer_reviews.title: They are great but I advise them for one use only
customer_reviews.text: These work well for my 12-year-old who is a competitive dancer. All of her costumes she is unable to wear a bra under them ,so we compromised and use these pasties . They say that they are for multiple use but we use them for one use only per competition because they do collect a lot of lint and are less sticky when you try to put them on the second time
customer_reviews.author: dspacc

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Got a mix though.
customer_reviews.text: I got a mix of round and flower-shaped. I didn’t see anywhere that I’d get a mix. Maybe it’s my fault. But FYI if that’s really important to you. But they stick really well! They’re soft and comfortable. I absolutely love the ability to store them. I’d buy these again, even if they give me a mix when I kind of just wanted round.
customer_reviews.author: Minna

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. These are my second set since I wear them daily they have lasted almost a year. I wear sports bras and don't like the triangles that come with them. These work better and dont show a seam.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I hate wearing a bra. I have size 32/34 C breasts. I have tried several types of pasties and these are my favorite. They are comfortable and have an extra padded part on the inside to help hide the nipple as much as possible. I wear them all the time and definitely recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked extremely well. I have only worn once so I haven't had the chance to see if the same pair sticks just as good as the first time. But if you need something in a pinch, this is worth your money. Didn't budge the entire night and came off easily with no leftover residue. The carrying case was very convenient since the pads are still sticky even after they are taken off.
customer_reviews.author: Malorie

customer_reviews.title: can't get the plastic off
customer_reviews.text: Each cover arrives between two pieces of saran wrap like plastic. The plastic on the sticky side is difficult to remove but it can be removed. The plastic on the other side sort of seems bonded to the silicone. The product is useable but I am not very happy with the odd plastic that doesn't peel off. I have purchased similar products previously but not from this manufacturer. the other products were nicer. I gave it 3 stars because it is useable and the price is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: I can only reside a pair about twice maybe three times but I do like them. They come I handy. But you can totally tell your wearing them through a shirt. I pretty much only wear them when I’m wearing something baggy or if I want to wear a cute Lacey bra without ripping my nipple ring out
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: The case is brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great idea with the carrying case!! The pasties I got are a little more yellow toned than previous ones I’ve owned which are more pink, but they work just as well plus I can keep my other ones in the case as well. So perfect for summer or just days when you don’t feel like wearing a bra but don’t want to deal with people staring at your nipples showing thru your shirt! And now with the case you can just throw it in your bag and it gives you the freedom to go braless or just insure extra discretion where and whenever.
customer_reviews.author: SunnySides

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky, super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these to work (8 hour shifts) and they stick really well. I don't even notice they're there. I've fallen asleep with them on. All the comfort of going bra-less without poking out through my shirt. Just as an FYI They don't provide any lift whatsoever if that's what you are looking for. I'm fine with it as I have sticky bras that do lift for days when I want it.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: No bra, even under dark T-shirts
customer_reviews.text: I wear my clothes a little loose, and these have helped me swear off bras completely. I have fairly sensitive skin, and these don't cause any problems. They are comfortable and very washable and rewearable, as long as you are careful to not get any lint or threads on the adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I like these especially since they are in a zippered case. This is my 2nd order from this seller, just the right size & stay in place. I live in Az where temps have been 114 & no problems. I tried another brand but didn’t like them so glad I got these. The only problem was they were delivered to my mailbox vs directly to my apt so instructions weren’t followed. I’m on crutches & had to get someone to get for me. I took up the delivery issues with Amazon. If your looking for covers try these. I also put them on my list so when I need to order again I won’t be searching for item.
customer_reviews.author: sharon white

customer_reviews.title: Sooo Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without these. They are so comfortable and adhesive that I don't know I have them on. I've worn them as long as 24 hours without having any problems, either. They have really helped me feel more confident in what I am wearing and how I look. Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: VA Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So, to be fair, I’ve never worn anything like these before, but these seem to be made using a mold, with a bit of excess material along the edges. They do the job, but I’m not sure they’re the best. I love the case they come in and they’re easy to put on and remove. I’ll be wearing them in Miami, so we’ll see how they hold up in the heat and out at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jer & Brit Laboy

customer_reviews.title: Love the little covers
customer_reviews.text: I am a 34 C cup and they work great, I always wore a bra as soon as I had coffee I put my Bra on. I work from home and run in and out during the day. These feel so good and I confident when I am wearing them that I don't poke an eye out. Thanks this is the second set I will buy more the set last all summer and I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Trailhound

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so that I could wear unpadded bras/sports bras without worrying about nips being visible through shirts. Having a set of 4 pairs is nice, you can rotate and let the previous pairs dry from cleaning. Could be worn all day, but could cause irritation if you sweat a lot. After a few uses I noticed the adhesive pealing around the edges. This is fine for now as the bra still holds it down some, but will shorten the longevity of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Dance mom yes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter to wear with a tight fitting dance costume. You CAN see them through the costume which was kind of a bummer but besides that they’re great. They stayed on all day despite numerous costume changes, and even she said she was surprised that they didn’t hurt at all to take off as she expected they would. We rinsed them and they were ready to go again the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Adri S

customer_reviews.title: Great for strappy tops
customer_reviews.text: These are great when a dress or top won’t work with a standard bra. They are very sticky and came in the cutest travel case. I tried these under a hoodie and I felt they were not adequate enough for my taste. I am a 32 C / 34 B and felt you could tell I wasn’t wearing a bra and could still have some show through. Works great under my spaghetti strap tanks and dresses though!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this purchase. I can wear them all day and they stay adhered. They are reusable. I have worn one pair several times without loosing stickiness. They are discreet 9/10 times, I really only have a few shirts that they can be seen through the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Jackson

customer_reviews.title: They do the job. And they do them well!
customer_reviews.text: They *flatten the nips *Are not visible under a sheer, white top *stay all day: zero slippage *no irritation *reusable I bought these to use after my boob-job (and 2-3 week surgical vest period), because they obviously don't add lift and can't irritate IM incisions. They have allowed me to appreciate my still tender, swollen, high ta-tas while gravity drops and time fluffs the implants.
customer_reviews.author: Nelljay

customer_reviews.title: Do not stay on!
customer_reviews.text: Ok fit but do not stay on, off after only 30 minutes. I am a guy and use these when I run instead of banaids. Got Hollywood Fashion Secrets Silicone Coverups in the past and they work great, stick great and durable. Wanted to save some money and ordered these. A big mistake. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: ELVEEZ

customer_reviews.title: fall off
customer_reviews.text: Mine fell off within the first 6 hours of use. Was told by the seller to wash them off and reapply. I did and they fell off within 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Pasties to date
customer_reviews.text: I have bought MANY of these, all different brands, but will continue buying these, from this seller, as long as they are available. The case is AWESOME! Great and discrete way to store in your purse. GREAT adhesion, Fantastic comfort and awesome fit.
customer_reviews.author: Oksccrlvr

customer_reviews.title: Nimple covers are the best ever
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for something like this for years. I should have known Amazon would locate them.They are great, a real value, the adhesive is great. I keep using the same pair over and over. Very comfortable and seemless.
customer_reviews.author: The Village Lady

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! They don’t show at all, fit well and aren’t uncomfortable. The adhesive stays on even in the Texas heat! Must buy. Perfect for strapless tops. Also, they come in a cute little zipper pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Shi

customer_reviews.title: Life Savers
customer_reviews.text: For a lady who hates to wear a bra and small. Love, Love these! I can get away with being braless with the covers. I appreciate these soo much! I rely on them during the summer time! My best friends.
customer_reviews.author: SassywClass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Design, Material and Fit!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING - after using one brand of adhesive pasties that gouged and scarred by skin - these are terrific. Fully covers my areolas, which are on the larger side, with a very smooth profile, no visible ridges or bumps through snug clothing! Thank you for a terrific product!
customer_reviews.author: eli g

customer_reviews.title: This is life changing
customer_reviews.text: This is a life changing product for me. I no longer need to wear bras every time. They are also reusable after a simple wash. I highly recommend this product for women who would like to free themselves from wearing bras.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Jin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect privacy!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! And the value can't be beat. They are a must have for most outfits. The product is soft and well-made. I love the carrying case that came with it!
customer_reviews.author: nursiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Too Pink
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described, Sticks well. We purchased these for pin-up models to hide their nipples for photographs when wearing something sheer. Unfortunately the pink color will show through when wearing a sheer blouse for dress. We plan on ordering the lighter creme color.
customer_reviews.author: Bomber Jacket Guy

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected, good quality and price and the little compact holder is great and convenient to keep them in. The only thing is I can’t wear these stickies with some super form fitting dresses and tops because then you can see the outline of the sticky, so then it looks like I have a really giant nipple lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! No one would ever know you're wearing them, but they're such great coverage and good for when you're cold for coverage too. Wore them while out on a patio in 93 degree weather and they stayed perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Larson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these...especially in the hot summer..just wear these without a bra and you stay a lot cooler...also good for use when wearing a top that would show bra straps.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: No more nip pops
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I stopped wearing bras & needed to cover my nips in certain shirts. These have done the job & done it well! I wash & reuse them almost every day. The stickiness comes back after it dries. The only dislike is that the edge become gross & floppy over time, but so far I can’t see that through my shirts so I’m okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: MirK

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used them yet...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wedding, but haven't used them yet, so I can't comment how well the adhesive worked. However, the quality felt comparable to the ones from department stores, Target, and etc. What I liked about this purchase was you get 4 pairs at a very reasonable price, so I will always have a back up pair. I can't wait to test them out soon!
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This product was well worth the money. Good coverage, and a nice, little carrying case. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: pianofingers

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for what they are and reusable which was what I was looking for. They are soft all around so they are comfortable to wear. You can't even feel them on.
customer_reviews.author: Mad King Lucian

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. That's all I can say. Any day I don't have to wear a nasty bra, is a good day! Thank you nipple hiders.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT! Stay in place and are definitely reusable. Wish I'd gotten sooner. LOVE.Even accidentally left on while in shower...no problem as they still function as if they had not gotten wet!
customer_reviews.author: K. Terry

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I have a top or dress with thin straps or a halter or backless so I can go bra less without ‘sticking’ out all over the place. I also use them under thin bras with removable padding because I don’t like the padding, but I need the layer between myself and my clothes to go out in public.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be a little light weight as compared to others but are sufficient to do the job correctly.
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: Stick Like Glue
customer_reviews.text: These work very well and adhere securely. They seem thick enough to be durable long-term.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first set I bought, but the last set were smaller and had irregular edges that showed through shirts more.
customer_reviews.author: tarheel patriot

customer_reviews.title: Great pasties!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love the case it comes with and they are very sticky and it has a piece of plastic to put over after done using. I wear a lot backless tops and dresses and these do exactly what i need them to do. They even lift a little but i have a small chest.
customer_reviews.author: Kam

customer_reviews.title: Conceal
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely not include a picture so as to better show potential buys how well they fit ! Haha. These seem to be ok, I haven’t tried them yet hence my late review. I’ll update after wearing
customer_reviews.author: Tommy W.

customer_reviews.title: So subtle! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This very subtle nipple pad if perfect from normal t-shirts to tight tanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Vega

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They so comfortable and so light I sometimes forget to take them off lol
customer_reviews.author: lori robbins

customer_reviews.title: Too noticeable
customer_reviews.text: Way too bulky for under thin clothing so you can see the round imprint pretty noticeably. Probably would work under much thicker material (but then you could probably just be wearing a bra).
customer_reviews.author: dr_yd

customer_reviews.title: One pairs goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: One pairs goes a long way, almost a week, with NO wash, no discomfort
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! Good quality and you can use multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mardis

customer_reviews.title: Good product and wll priced
customer_reviews.text: I found these very easy to put on and use. They were also very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: See through, excess clear plastic on edges I have to cut it out. Not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase. The nipple cover quality is good and I like it comes with a pouch which is good for storing back when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H.

customer_reviews.title: Stays on even when you sweat
customer_reviews.text: Great product, comfortable, does not irritate, and best thing stays on when you sweat. I worked outside all day planting plants, yard work, etc. They never slipped or came off. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boa

customer_reviews.title: nice case. Do not stick
customer_reviews.text: Much thinner than expected; nice case. Do not stick well
customer_reviews.author: yhunter

customer_reviews.title: Great extra coverage
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable. Take them off or leave them on. They hold up in and under water.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: no show!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely perfect! No show at all! Stick great & all day!
customer_reviews.author: lacie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help.
customer_reviews.text: These are far too thick. You can totally see them in every shirt. Makes it look like I have huge areoles. I wouldn’t purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Meagon

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable to wear. I don't enjoy wearing a bra. These are a great substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I cannot were normal pasties, I am allergic to adhesive. These covers are very comfortable, had no issues with them staying in place; even in the middle of Summer!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D Lambrecht

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am really confused about the good reviews people are adding. Maybe I received a bad one. I was excited to use this product, and the experience from using it for the first few days was pretty good. But its been 11 days since I received this and the pasties are already falling off. Stickiness is almost gone, its not that I am not taking care of it. Surely they are going to be useless after few more days. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kety

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, reusable!
customer_reviews.text: Works great when i prefer not to wear a bra!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive allergy
customer_reviews.text: The description said “self adhesive” but it’s not. It has adhesive on it. The self adhesive is the kind that stay on with your body heat. I am allergic to adhesive. Mid leading. Bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Loni N.

customer_reviews.title: Good product that does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in good shape and on time. These adhere nicely and cover very well. I like that they are reusable and I also like the little case they came in. The price was good also for a set of four.
customer_reviews.author: CookieInNH

customer_reviews.title: Like the product.
customer_reviews.text: I hope they stay together better than ones I have ordered in the past,Thanks for all you do in this trying time.
customer_reviews.author: Marie P.

customer_reviews.title: Stayed in place
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these! Stay on in place all day!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t want nipples to show
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after I had surgery on my clavicle and my doctor said I could not wear a bra with straps. These got to me quicker than the strapless bra and are more comfortable than the strapless bra, so they work great if you just don’t want your nipples to show.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wolin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: They’re so comfy, easy to apply, and I forget that I’m wearing them. Love that it comes with a case too. It also doesn’t show through my shirts.
customer_reviews.author: NBruno

customer_reviews.title: Only good for A or B cup
customer_reviews.text: This item maybe is good for A cup or B cup but nothing larger . So for me it wasn’t good at all. Feel bad because I thought I would use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Syby

customer_reviews.title: I wear them with almost anything.
customer_reviews.text: I like to wear these with shirts that are a little sheer. But if you are wearing a thin white top I feel like you can still see your nipples. Other than that I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: ... even when you perspiration it's conformed to the skin like a charm
customer_reviews.text: It works really well even when you perspiration it's conformed to the skin like a charm. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kritboonyarit

customer_reviews.title: They are a good quality product and come in a small
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these pasties. They are a good quality product and come in a small, travel size reusable storage pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Yash

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too thick. Exacerbate the noticeability issue they're supposed to fix.
customer_reviews.author: emt103c

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and thickness
customer_reviews.text: I use these for concealing a dent from reconstruction surgery. They last for weeks. Even good in the shower and at night.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They fit great! Only issue is the plastic part is not properly fixed on each pasty so part of the adhesive is exposed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer123AC

customer_reviews.title: These were great!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these! They're great for backless or strappy tops, the adhesive works great! They don't move when you sweat, they were very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Danhoff

customer_reviews.title: Shows when wearing a swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: The covers show the outer lining when wearing a swimsuit so I wasted money on this purchase because I solely bought it for swimming. It does stick well at least.
customer_reviews.author: Youngsook Choi

customer_reviews.title: Good but sadly not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so my breast would be kind of invisible, but the thickness of the product made it more noticeable when wearing a swim suit.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Fit and adhere very well. Less expensive than other products I have used Will continue to purchase in the future. I also like the zippered compact they came in.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN J DeV

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery. They came in a small round case which I love because it makes storing these so simple.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen E. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Concealed nicely
customer_reviews.text: I started wearing unlined/unpadded bras and this product concealed and can be reused. I love that they came with its own case (came in handy while traveling). I would have loved to see more skin tone colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Columbo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Today its hard to find bras with modesty panels. This product was perfect. Just what I was looking for. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CAP

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: These met all expectations. I forgot they were there. They stayed in place and were very comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Cover ups
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for !!! Works great 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Lucas

customer_reviews.title: This are perfect if you don't like wearing padded bras but don't ...
customer_reviews.text: This are perfect if you don't like wearing padded bras but don't want "headlights". They stay sticky a LOOOOOOOONG time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Well
customer_reviews.text: they stick really well on the skin and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 round pairs but what I got was 2 round and 2 flower. I don't care for the flower
customer_reviews.author: Karen plueger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coverage
customer_reviews.text: They worked great, glad I bought them. Would recommend them with and without a bra.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for big breast
customer_reviews.text: They does not fully cover my nipples and since I have long breasts, they don’t reach low enough.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Poelker

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The zipper pouch included keeps the pasties together and discreet! I’ve used a pair multiple times already and still has strong adhesion.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really great. Stayed on all day, mo issues.

customer_reviews.title: Always peeling off
customer_reviews.text: I worm them not for more than an hour for they kept peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: pedro milian

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Round, pink container is perfect for traveling with these pasties.

customer_reviews.title: So far the best
customer_reviews.text: The best pasties that I have tried. Iwould buy more soon.

customer_reviews.title: Low grade materials.

customer_reviews.title: reusable
customer_reviews.text: I put it into my swim suit. It's good and comfortable. There are 4 pairs and it's reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Where were these all my life??
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! One of the best purchases ever. Stick wonderfully and extremely comfortable. Didnt even feel them.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I have used 1 pair several times and they are holding up well, plenty of adhesion. Smooth and seamless when wearing a tighter fitting top. Very impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Pasties
customer_reviews.text: I’m a model and they stayed on all day at the show! Very impressed

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: They work very well and love the case that holds them!

product_meta.title: QUXIANG 4 Pairs Pasties Women Nipple Covers Reusable Adhesive Silicone Nippleless Covers (4 Round)
feature_bullets: PERFECT COMPANION FOR LATEST TRENDS Women Pasties Reusable Silicone Nipple Covers - Eco-friendly silicone material, Comfortably on all skin types. 2.75" diameter for more secure coverage. They are natural and soft, you won't feel anything when wearing them.

FASHION ADHESIVE NIPPLE COVER Pasties for Women - The adhesive silicone nipple covers are specially designed to wear under crop tops, sports bra, t-shirts, backless, strapless and sheer dress, swimwear, and gowns. According to the female breasts exclusive design, gradually thinning from the middle to the edge, clinging to the breasts, forming a smooth natural "skin", no sweat and no embarrassing outline.

MADE FROM MEDICAL GRADE(hypo-allergenic Eco-friendly)silicone, so they can be worn comfortably even on the most sensitive skin. Lightweight and handy, we offer a QUXIANG portable box, which designed to be small enough to fit in a handbag. Carry these petals in your purse anytime and anywhere for a quick fashion fix.

COMFORTABLE & SEXY - QUXIANG Nipple Covers are so comfortable you will forget you are using them, giving you the natural feeling. Self-adhesive & reusable - after each use, simply hand wash the nipple concealers under warm water with mild soap and let air dry face down. Once dry, self-adhesive properties are restored and can be reused 25 times or more.
WE KNOW YOU'LL LOVE OUR PRODUCTS. If you aren't satisfied, return them for a full refund.
